title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Stylized pattern of stiff foliage worked in silk and metallic thread with white and orange glass brilliants on a black ground with a green and violet rib weave.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Medium: silk, metallic thread, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-13.
